overview: Sorn is an indy and humorous leading actor of Kru Pol Mor Lam group. His skill is no inferior to others. Nevertheless, his broken heart is causing him to lose his job. Toan is a simple and calm. He respects Sorn like his own brother. Toan has an exceptional esteem from Kai Mook, Kru Pol’s beautiful daugther. She is hiding her love from Toan because she wholly knows that Toan is actually loving on Pim, a descendant of the elders Phu and Porn who wish to setup a prosper marrige for their daughter.
title: Hug Paeng
